LanguageData.LabelBV: A Vile Force Of Darkness Has Arrived!
LanguageData.DescBV: As you watch the approaching darkness you know death has come to Rimworld.. You turn to yell for the others.. "RUN!" but the Darkness is already upon you. Only blackness and your own screams remain...you cannot escape this fate. The last thing you feel, before you fall into the Abyss, is your flesh being torn from your bones. The Darkest Night has arrived. Prepare yourself, for the darkness consumes all! \n\nStay within light sources for protection!

LanguageData.DarknessComes: The Darkness is out to get you!
LanguageData.OmniousDarkDesc: The darkness has moved on, but you are not safe from its path... \n\n The Darkness will meet with you again, soon...
LanguageData.DarkestNightSK.event1Desc: Passive Darkness event, is a more calm event, where the darkness doesnt hunt you down specifically, but only if you get close. They are also slower.
LanguageData.DescBVPassive: A strange but calm darkness is spotted in the distance, its slowly moving towards your settlement.
LanguageData.DarkestNightSK.event2Desc: Looming Darkness Event, is a normal event, except you see the darkness coming earlier on the horizon, giving you more time to prepare.
LanguageData.DescBVLooming: A strange darkness is spotted on the horizon, its moving quite fast towards the settlement. You better prepare.
LanguageData.DarkestNightSK.event3Desc: Normal Darkness Event, is a normal event, you only have 60 seconds to prepare, the darkness will hunt your colonists down and break your doors.
